definition: to control/to accuse/to charge/to sue/to invert a container to empty it/(suffix) (slang) buff/enthusiast/devotee/-phile or -philia

sentences.english: The improvement of the relationship between criminal prosecution and the defense of China.
sentences.chinese: 我國刑事訴訟控辯關係的特點及缺陷。

sentences.english: Developing the "Theory of Equality of Prosecution and Defense".
China's current criminal suit is characterized by the system of control of defense.
sentences.chinese: 我國現行刑事訴訟制度具有控辯制的特點。

sentences.english: The equality of the prosecution and the defense is the core of the reform of criminal trial.
sentences.chinese: 控辯平等問題是刑事審判改革中的核心內容。
